com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.ui.controller

Class AddPolicyController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.ui.controller.AddPolicyController

  • public class AddPolicyController
extends java.lang.Object
    A session scoped, managed bean for user interfaces related to adding a new Policy instance
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Salman Ahmad Ansari <10besesansari@seecs.edu.pk>, Arjumand Fatima <09bicseafatima@seecs.edu.pk>

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.lang.String appliedAlgo
      A String variable to store the value of ruleCombAlgo attribute of the Policy instance to be created.
      com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.Target appliedTarget
      A Target variable to store the value of target attribute of the Policy instance to be created.
      java.lang.String description
      A String variable to store the value of description attribute of the Policy instance to be created.
      java.lang.String name
      A String variable to store the value of policyId attribute of the Policy instance to be created.
      java.util.ArrayList<com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.Rule> ruleList
      An ArrayList of Rule(s) that are applicable for the Policy instance to be created.
      com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.Policy selectedPolicy
      An instance of Policy used to store the Policy selected by the user from the user interface.
